text: Signed, Sealed & Delivered is the twelfth studio album by American recording artist Stevie Wonder. It was released on August 7, 1970, by Tamla. It was also Wonder's third album to be released in 1970 as he had already released two live albums earlier on in the year. ==Track listing== Side One #"Never Had a Dream Come True" (Stevie Wonder, Henry Cosby and Sylvia Moy) \- 3:13 #"We Can Work It Out" (John Lennon, Paul McCartney) \- 3:19 #"Signed, Sealed, Delivered, I'm Yours" (Lee Garrett, Lula Mae Hardaway, Stevie Wonder and Syreeta Wright) \- 2:39 #"Heaven Help Us All" (Ron Miller) \- 3:13 #"You Can't Judge a Book By Its Cover" (Henry Cosby, Pam Sawyer and Stevie Wonder) \- 2:32 #"Sugar" (Don Hunter and Stevie Wonder) \- 2:52 Side Two #"Don't Wonder Why" (Leonard Caston) \- 4:54 #"Anything You Want Me To Do" (Hunter, Lula Mae Hardaway, Paul Riser and Stevie Wonder) \- 2:19 #"I Can't Let My Heaven Walk Away" (Joe Hinton and Pam Sawyer) \- 2:53 #"Joy (Takes Over Me)" (Duke Browner) \- 2:12 #"I Gotta Have a Song" (Don Hunter, Hardaway, Paul Riser and Stevie Wonder) \- 2:32 #"Something to Say" (Don Hunter and Stevie Wonder) \- 3:26 ==References== Category:1970 albums Category:R&B; albums Category:Soul albums Category:Funk albums Category:Stevie Wonder albums
title: Signed, Sealed & Delivered
